text:
Júlio Pomar, GOL, GCM (January 10, 1926 – May 22, 2018) was a Portuguese painter. He was born in Lisbon. Pomar worked in the neo-realist movement from 1945-1957 and later became a neo-expressionist. He illustrated a children's book by American-Portuguese novelist Richard Zimler.
Pomar died at the age of 92 at a hospital in Lisbon on May 22, 2018.
